text: Ukraine national football team is the national football team of Ukraine. == Most appearances == # Player Caps Goals Period 1 Anatoliy Tymoshchuk 144 4 2000–2016 2 Andriy Shevchenko 111 48 1995–2012 3 Ruslan Rotan 100 8 2003–2018 4 Andriy Yarmolenko 98 42 2009– Oleh Husyev 98 13 2003–2016 5 Andriy Pyatov 97 0 2007– 6 Oleksandr Shovkovskyi 92 0 1994–2012 7 Yevhen Konoplyanka 86 21 2010– 8 Serhiy Rebrov 75 15 1992–2006 9 Andriy Voronin 74 8 2002–2012 == Top scorers == # Player Goals Caps Average Period 1 Andriy Shevchenko 48 111 1995–2012 2 Andriy Yarmolenko 42 98 2009– 3 Yevhen Konoplyanka 21 86 2010– 4 Serhiy Rebrov 15 75 1992–2006 5 Oleh Husyev 13 98 2003–2016 6 Serhiy Nazarenko 12 56 2003–2012 7 Yevhen Seleznyov 11 58 2008–2018 8 Roman Yaremchuk 10 27 2018– 9 Andriy Vorobey 9 68 2000–2008 Andriy Husin 9 71 1993–2006 ==References== Category:European national football teams Category:Football in Ukraine Category:Sports organizations of Ukraine
